D

DefaultEyeFov() - Method in class org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRHmdDesc.Buffer
Returns a OVRFovPort.Buffer view of the DefaultEyeFov field.
DefaultEyeFov() - Method in class org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRHmdDesc
Returns a OVRFovPort.Buffer view of the DefaultEyeFov field.

Enable if using left-handed transformations in your application.
ovrProjection_None - Static variable in class org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRUtil
Use for generating a default projection matrix that is: Right-handed. Near depth values stored in the depth buffer are smaller than far depth values. Both near and far are explicitly defined. With a clipping range that is (0 to w).
